com.atakmap.android.gui.drawable

Class VisibilityDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • com.atakmap.android.gui.drawable.ThreeStateDrawable
        • com.atakmap.android.gui.drawable.VisibilityDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action, Visibility, Visibility2

    public class VisibilityDrawable
extends ThreeStateDrawable
implements Visibility2
    3 state visibility icon used by Overlay Manager Plugins should use this class when implementing their own custom row layouts in Overlay Manager
